TopicTitle: no clue where to ask this, so i decided to ask here.

Articles.Content:
anyone know how to define a new 'measurement system' in either of these? (preferrably libreoffice.) what i want to do, at least at first, is give a spreadsheet im working on the ability to work with kerbin days and years. (day is 6 hours, year is 462.1 days) does anyone know how do do this? is this the right place to ask?

Edited May 19, 2016 by toric5

I've used OpenOffice / LibreOffice for years. I don't believe you can do that, at least not literally. However, there are useful functions which you could use in Calc in your spreadsheet, to define your own functions to deal with it.

https://help.libreoffice.org/Calc/Functions_by_Category
